sentences.english: Like those anti-free-speechrioters in Berkeley and Portland?
sentences.chinese: 像伯克利和波兰的反言论自由的暴民一样？

sentences.english: It is a mob compacted of violent elements of the underworld.
sentences.chinese: 那是一群由黑社会的凶悍分子组成的暴民。

sentences.english: The blood-thirsty mob lynched the alleged killer of the child.
sentences.chinese: 残忍的暴民对被指控的儿童杀手处以私刑。

sentences.english: The rioters were encircled by a well-coordinated police operation.
sentences.chinese: 暴民被配合良好的警方团团包围。

sentences.english: The angry mob lynched an innocent man.
sentences.chinese: 病狂的暴民私刑冶死一名无辜。

sentences.english: The news was that the mob had broken down the barricades and were even then preparing to storm the palace.
sentences.chinese: 传来的消息说暴民已经冲破了路障，正准备直捣宫廷。

sentences.english: The police managed to dissipate the mob in minutes.
The rabble soon grew violent and unmanageable.
sentences.chinese: 暴民们很快地变得狂暴和无法控制。

sentences.english: The rioters dispersed only after military tanks rumbled through the street.
sentences.chinese: 只有当坦克驶入街道后暴民才四散奔逃。

sentences.english: I can hear the lynch mob coming with their pitchforks and torches.
sentences.chinese: 我可以听到暴民与干草叉和火把来。

sentences.english: Anyone who’s seen an angry mob knows it.
sentences.chinese: 任何见过愤怒暴民的人们都会明白这一点。

sentences.english: When you get some mobs on you, just run through and feign death.
sentences.chinese: 当你找一些暴民在你刚刚贯穿和佯死。

sentences.english: The angry mob lynched an innocent man .
sentences.chinese: 病狂的暴民私刑冶死一名无辜。

definition: loose and disorganized soldiers/stragglers/fig. a loner
